>
[Great Bear](/Feats.aspx?ID=4091) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Ursine Avenger Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4086)

</column>

---

When you transform, you can take on a bear's bulk and size. You can spend an additional action when using Ursine Avenger Form to gain the effects of a 1st-rank [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) spell, which lasts for the spell's normal duration or until you leave your Ursine Avenger Form, whichever comes first.

<title level="2">Great Bear leads to...</title>
[Mighty Bear](/Feats.aspx?ID=4094)
name: Great Bear
